languages.text: "Я проанализировал геном пораженных видов и пытаюсь разработать гены-супрессоры, дабы сделать организмы на планете устойчивыми к патологии, но пока мне не удалось решить проблему. Возможно, дальнейшее исследование планеты ускорило бы процессы, однако административный аппарат наложил запрет на экспедиции, не имеющие своей целью непосредственное улучшение производства".

traits.locale_text: "Я проанализировал геном пораженных видов и пытаюсь разработать гены-супрессоры, дабы сделать организмы на планете устойчивыми к патологии, но пока мне не удалось решить проблему. Возможно, дальнейшее исследование планеты ускорило бы процессы, однако административный аппарат наложил запрет на экспедиции, не имеющие своей целью непосредственное улучшение производства".

languages.text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."
languages.original_text: "Я проанализировал геном пораженных видов и пытаюсь разработать гены-супрессоры, дабы сделать организмы на планете устойчивыми к патологии, но пока мне не удалось решить проблему. Возможно, дальнейшее исследование планеты ускорило бы процессы, однако административный аппарат наложил запрет на экспедиции, не имеющие своей целью непосредственное улучшение производства".

Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

"I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

languages.text: 「影響を受けた生物種の遺伝子を分析するとともに、この星の有機体が病変に抵抗できるような抑制遺伝子を目下開発中です。しかし、現状では問題解決に至っておりません。この惑星の調査を進めればおそらく、このプロセスを早められるでしょうが、生産物の改良を直接の目的としない遠征は行政組織により禁じられているのです」
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

traits.locale_text: 「影響を受けた生物種の遺伝子を分析するとともに、この星の有機体が病変に抵抗できるような抑制遺伝子を目下開発中です。しかし、現状では問題解決に至っておりません。この惑星の調査を進めればおそらく、このプロセスを早められるでしょうが、生産物の改良を直接の目的としない遠征は行政組織により禁じられているのです」

languages.text: “我已经分析了受影响物种的基因组，目前正在开发抑制基因，帮助行星上的生物对病变产生抵抗力。不过到目前为止，我还并没有解决这个问题。如果可以进一步探索这颗行星的话，或许可以加快这些进程。不过，行政机构认为这样的探索不会直接提高农作物产量，因此实施了禁令。”
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

traits.locale_text: “我已经分析了受影响物种的基因组，目前正在开发抑制基因，帮助行星上的生物对病变产生抵抗力。不过到目前为止，我还并没有解决这个问题。如果可以进一步探索这颗行星的话，或许可以加快这些进程。不过，行政机构认为这样的探索不会直接提高农作物产量，因此实施了禁令。”

languages.text: «He analizado el genoma de las especies afectadas y estoy desarrollando un gen supresor que conceda resistencia a dicha patología, pero de momento no he sabido resolver el problema. Tal vez el proceso se agilizaría si se explorara más el planeta, pero las élites administrativas han prohibido las expediciones que no estén directamente destinadas a mejorar la producción».
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

traits.locale_text: «He analizado el genoma de las especies afectadas y estoy desarrollando un gen supresor que conceda resistencia a dicha patología, pero de momento no he sabido resolver el problema. Tal vez el proceso se agilizaría si se explorara más el planeta, pero las élites administrativas han prohibido las expediciones que no estén directamente destinadas a mejorar la producción».

languages.text: "Ich habe das Genom der betroffenen Spezies analysiert und entwickle aktuell Suppressorgene, um die Organismen des Planeten unempfindlich gegen den Befall zu machen, aber bisher habe ich das Problem noch nicht lösen können. Eine weitere Erkundung des Planeten würde das Vorhaben vielleicht beschleunigen, aber der Verwaltungsapparat hat Expeditionen verboten, die nicht direkt die Produktion steigern."
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe das Genom der betroffenen Spezies analysiert und entwickle aktuell Suppressorgene, um die Organismen des Planeten unempfindlich gegen den Befall zu machen, aber bisher habe ich das Problem noch nicht lösen können. Eine weitere Erkundung des Planeten würde das Vorhaben vielleicht beschleunigen, aber der Verwaltungsapparat hat Expeditionen verboten, die nicht direkt die Produktion steigern."

languages.text: « J'ai analysé le génome des espèces affectées et je mets actuellement au point des gènes suppresseurs qui aideront les organismes de cette planète à résister à ces pathologies. Cependant, je n'ai pas encore réussi à résoudre le problème. Des explorations plus poussées permettraient peut-être d'accélérer les processus, mais l'administration a interdit toute expédition qui ne vise pas à améliorer directement la production. »
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai analysé le génome des espèces affectées et je mets actuellement au point des gènes suppresseurs qui aideront les organismes de cette planète à résister à ces pathologies. Cependant, je n'ai pas encore réussi à résoudre le problème. Des explorations plus poussées permettraient peut-être d'accélérer les processus, mais l'administration a interdit toute expédition qui ne vise pas à améliorer directement la production. »

languages.text: "Etkilenmiş türlerin genomlarının analizini yaptım, şu anda da gezegendeki organizmaları patolojiye dirençli hâle getirecek baskılayıcı genlerin geliştirilmesi üzerinde çalışıyorum ancak henüz sorunu çözebilmiş değilim. Gezegenin daha büyük bir kısmının keşfi büyük ihtimalle süreci hızlandıracaktır. Ancak yönetim kademelerindekiler, direkt olarak üretkenliği artırma hedefinde olmayan keşif yolculuklarına yasak getirdiler."
languages.original_text: "I have analysed the genome of the affected species and I am currently developing suppressor genes to make the planet's organisms resistant to pathology, but so far I have not been able to solve the problem. Further exploration of the planet would perhaps speed up these processes, but the administrative apparatus has imposed a ban on expeditions that are not directly aimed at improving production."
